# UITableViewRowAction.Style.normal

**Case**

Apply a style that reflects standard non-destructive actions.

## Declaration

```swift
case normal
```

## Styles

- **UITableViewRowAction.Style.default**: Apply the default style to the button.
- **destructive**: Equal to the default style.

items.description: Apply the default style to the button.
